name: @vcd/bindings
description: Typescript bindings for the vCloud Director API
author: VMware

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc && ncp build/ dist/ && npm run copy-metadata
scripts.mvn:prepare-package: ncp target/build/ target/dist/ && npm run copy-metadata
scripts.mvn:deploy: cpy .npmrc.dist .npmrc && npm publish target/dist --access public --dry-run && rimraf .npmrc
